name: Average Entry Exit Time
query:
select 
  users.name as `User Code:Link/Biometric Users:100`,
  users.user_name as `User Name:Data:150`, 
  machine.branch as `Branch:Data:100`,
  branch.opening_time as `Opening Time:Time:100`,
  branch.closing_time as `Closing Time:Time:100`,
  count(if(timestampdiff(MINUTE,cast(branch.opening_time as Time), cast(att.timestamp as time))<=120, 1, NULL)) as `Eligible Entry Counts:Int:50`,
  count(if(timestampdiff(MINUTE,cast(branch.closing_time as Time), cast(att.timestamp as time))>=120, 1, NULL)) as `Eligible Exit Counts:Int:50`,  
  count(*) as `Total Count:Int:50`,  
  sec_to_time(avg(if(timestampdiff(MINUTE,cast(if(users.differ_timings,users.allowed_entry_time,branch.opening_time) as Time), cast(att.timestamp as time))<=120,time_to_sec(cast(att.timestamp as time)),NULL))) as `Average Entry Time:Time:100`,
  sec_to_time(avg(if(timestampdiff(MINUTE,cast(if(users.differ_timings,users.allowed_exit_time,branch.closing_time) as Time), cast(att.timestamp as time))>=120,time_to_sec(cast(att.timestamp as time)),NULL))) as `Average Exit Time:Time:100`
from 
  `tabBiometric Users` users, 
  `tabBiometric Attendance` att,
  `tabBranch Settings` branch,
  `tabEnrolled Users` enrolled,
  `tabBiometric Machine` machine
where 
  att.user_id = cast(substring(users.name,3) as Integer) 
  and cast(att.timestamp as date) >= %(from_date)s
  and cast(att.timestamp as date) <= %(to_date)s
  and machine.name like %(machine)s
  and machine.branch = branch.branch
  and enrolled.parent = machine.name
  and enrolled.user = users.name 
group by 
  machine.branch,
  users.name
